byline.original: By THE ASSOCIATED PRESS and SCOTT CACCIOLA

abstract: NBA Roundup; Chicago Bulls win first-round playoff series against Milwaukee Bucks with 120-66 victory in game six; other basketball news noted.
lead_paragraph: The Bulls, who will face the Cavaliers in the second round, finished 4 points shy of an N.B.A. playoff record for largest margin of victory.

headline.main: Bulls Pummel Bucks by 54 and Will Face Cavaliers
headline.print_headline: Bulls Pummel Bucks by 54 and Will Face the Cavaliers

snippet: The Bulls, who will face the Cavaliers in the second round, finished 4 points shy of an N.B.A. playoff record for largest margin of victory.
